mapper.select: Select r.review_num ,r.review_score ,r.review_date ,r.review_comment ,o.order_num ,m.member_name FROM review r JOIN anvd_order o ON r.order_num = o.order_num JOIN member m ON o.member_num = m.member_num

select i.item_num, i.item_name, i.item_image, i.item_info, i.item_status, i.item_date, c.category_name, c.parent_category from item i join category c on (i.category_id = c.category_id) where item_num = 1
mapper.insert: insert into review (order_num, review_score, review_comment) values (#{orderNum}, #{reviewScore}, #{reviewComment})
